input: Bob is green. Bob is white. Dave is blue. Dave is cold. Dave is green. Dave is white. Fiona is cold. Fiona is green. Fiona is white. Fiona is young. Gary is kind. Gary is white. Cold, white people are furry. If someone is furry then they are green. All cold people are young. If someone is kind and young then they are blue. If someone is furry then they are blue. All white, kind people are young. All kind, blue people are cold. If Bob is blue then Bob is kind. Question: Gary is green.?
output:
universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Bob : obj
constant Dave : obj
constant Fiona : obj
constant Gary : obj

constant Green : obj → Prop
constant White : obj → Prop
constant Blue : obj → Prop
constant Cold : obj → Prop
constant Young : obj → Prop
constant Kind : obj → Prop
constant Furry : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : Green Bob
axiom T2 : White Bob
axiom T3 : Blue Dave
axiom T4 : Cold Dave
axiom T5 : Green Dave
axiom T6 : White Dave
axiom T7 : Cold Fiona
axiom T8 : Green Fiona
axiom T9 : White Fiona
axiom T10 : Young Fiona
axiom T11 : Kind Gary
axiom T12 : White Gary

axiom R1 : ∀ x : obj, Cold x ∧ White x → Furry x
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, Furry x → Green x
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Cold x → Young x
axiom R4 : ∀ x : obj, Kind x ∧ Young x → Blue x
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Furry x → Blue x
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, White x ∧ Kind x → Young x
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Kind x ∧ Blue x → Cold x
axiom R8 : Blue Bob → Kind Bob

theorem gary_is_green : Green Gary :=
begin
  apply R2,
  apply R1,
  split,
  apply R7,
  split,
  apply R4,
  split,
  exact T11,
  apply R6,
  split,
  exact T12,
  exact T11,
  exact T11,
  exact T12,
end

-- The answer is True
